26d6bbcb-6768-4a3e-857b-30d2cbca6086.description: Earners of the Certified Sales Consultant badge have the foundational knowledge and skills required to sell SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as presenting, target market selling and analysis, as well as using other SYSPRO sales-related tools and methodologies. They also understand the SYSPRO company and solution.
26d6bbcb-6768-4a3e-857b-30d2cbca6086.name: Certified Sales Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of eight (8) eLearning courses and one (1) online examination.

65ef7cb4-cac8-4082-bcc6-3a9338907646.description: Earners of the Certified Manufacturing Solutions Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Manufacturing-related SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as troubleshooting, inventory management, and production management. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution but specialize in the SYSPRO Manufacturing solutions.
65ef7cb4-cac8-4082-bcc6-3a9338907646.name: Certified Manufacturing Solutions Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications. This is comprised of twenty (20) online examinations.

cc79715c-261b-42a1-b008-7cfeb0cf249d.description: Earners of the Certified Enterprise Reporting and Analysis Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the analytics and reporting-related SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as troubleshooting, report writing, and analytics. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution but specialize in SYSPRO Reporting Services, Financial Report Writer, and SYSPRO Analytics.
cc79715c-261b-42a1-b008-7cfeb0cf249d.name: Certified Enterprise Reporting and Analysis Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications. This is comprised of ten (10) online examinations.

4aae74d0-b0d0-430b-8dc9-5793b518b0fa.description: Earners of the Certified Project Manager badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to manage a SYSPRO initial implementation or upgrade project. They are competent in skills such as project management and using project management-related tools and methodologies. They also understand the SYSPRO company, solution, and implementation methodology.
4aae74d0-b0d0-430b-8dc9-5793b518b0fa.name: Certified Project Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.
Achieve a valid external Project Management Certification.

61557361-c505-4c54-b8d1-691ad090ec31.description: Earners of the e.net Solutions Developer Consultant badge have intermediate knowledge and skills required to integrate software with SYSPRO using e.net Solutions business objects. Earners understand the e.net solutions architecture, business objects and e.net Diagnostics.
61557361-c505-4c54-b8d1-691ad090ec31.name: Certified e.net Solutions Developer Consultant - L1

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of five (5) online examinations.

dfe3ea74-c58f-4503-af04-4eda015f53a7.description: Earners of the Certified Distribution Solutions Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Distribution-related SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as troubleshooting, sales order processing, purchasing, and inventory management. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution but specialize in the SYSPRO Distribution solutions.
dfe3ea74-c58f-4503-af04-4eda015f53a7.name: Certified Distribution Solutions Consultant

4fc2ab43-9d77-47e8-94ee-9220b91432f4.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of the basic SYSPRO sales, purchasing, and manufacturing business processes and are aware of the SYSPRO modules, features, and functions used in these processes. They are also familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can navigate the SYSPRO 7 system and process basic transactions related to the business processes which SYSPRO supports.
4fc2ab43-9d77-47e8-94ee-9220b91432f4.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - SYSPRO Onboarding

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO Onboarding for SYSPRO Users. This is comprised of four (4) online examinations.

63eba977-060c-4cd9-b035-c649f5d4b7f8.description: Earners of the Certified Financial Solutions Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Financial-related SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as troubleshooting, balancing, financial report writing and asset management. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution but specialize in the SYSPRO Financial solutions.
63eba977-060c-4cd9-b035-c649f5d4b7f8.name: Certified Financial Solutions Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications. This is comprised of fifteen (15) online examinations.

1f38a56b-5aa9-4bf3-86b0-26a3c83219b3.description: Earners have completed a 12 hr max. MHFA face-to-face or blended MHFA course comprising e-learning modules & face-to-face workshops. Earners have achieved accreditation through MHFA or Local Trainer. Earners have learned how to assist adults who are developing a mental health problem, experiencing the worsening of an existing mental health problem, or in a mental health crisis, until appropriate professional help is received or the crisis is resolved, using the ALGEE Framework.
1f38a56b-5aa9-4bf3-86b0-26a3c83219b3.name: Mental Health First Aider

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 12 hour max. MHFA face-to-face course or the blended MHFA course comprising e-learning modules and face-to-face workshop.

The Earners understand the sales and purchasing cycles, are familiar with the SYSPRO user interface and can discuss the distribution solutions.
32302381-aabb-4f41-abcf-e5076c9a67d9.name: SYSPRO Starters - Distribution

2c2a3ec8-bb4e-4d55-a014-423e920d0bb5.description: Earners of the Certified Administration Solutions Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Administration-related SYSPRO features. They are competent in skills such as system analysis, troubleshooting, security management and SYSPRO Avanti administration. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution, but specialize in SYSPRO system administration, customization and security.

cb63f352-5cde-4ffd-86e1-e0dae9ef799a.description: Earners of the SYSPRO Starters - Manufacturing badge have completed courses which provide the foundation for further learning about the manufacturing programs and functionality within SYSPRO. cb63f352-5cde-4ffd-86e1-e0dae9ef799a.name: SYSPRO Starters - Manufacturing

9d09cb96-60c4-416e-9c33-fa29277defb4.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as an Inventory Control Manager or Dispatcher. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to manage inventory, goods delivery, and goods receipts; perform period end tasks; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the relevant business processes.
9d09cb96-60c4-416e-9c33-fa29277defb4.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Inventory Control Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Inventory Control Role. This is comprised of four (4) online examinations.

00099750-0c28-47c2-ad68-30eee5ad7388.description: Earners of the Certified SYSPRO Process Modeler badge have the foundational knowledge and skills required to model SYSPRO solutions using Enterprise Architect and the SYSPRO Process Modeling (SPM) architecture. They are competent in skills such as business process modeling, software system process modeling, and other process modeling related tools and methodologies. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and solution, but specialize in creating and maintaining SPM models.
00099750-0c28-47c2-ad68-30eee5ad7388.name: Certified SYSPRO Process Modeler

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of five (5) online examinations.

5ad45eaf-d320-49fe-bc9c-e885b6a687cc.description: Earners of the SYSPRO Starters - Administration badge have completed courses which provide the foundation for further learning about the administration programs and functionality within SYSPRO. The Earners are familiar with the SYSPRO user interface and can discuss the administration functionality. This includes where to enable system and company options, levels of security and basic customization of SYSPRO i.e. menus and programs.
5ad45eaf-d320-49fe-bc9c-e885b6a687cc.name: SYSPRO Starters - Administration

e419bc9f-3ea6-4aae-9021-1ca34b677553.description: Earners of the SYSPRO Starters - Financial badge have completed courses which provide the foundation for further learning about the financial programs and functionality within SYSPRO. The Earners understand the payments and receipts cycles, are familiar with the SYSPRO user interface and can discuss the financial solutions.
e419bc9f-3ea6-4aae-9021-1ca34b677553.name: SYSPRO Starters - Financial

c581c011-3b22-427f-b423-4af59542eadd.description: Earners of the Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Receivables Role badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as an Accounts Receivable Clerk or Accounts Receivable Manager. They can use SYSPRO 7 to maintain customers; process invoices, credit notes and debit notes; manage outstanding payments, received payments, and collections; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the sales process.
c581c011-3b22-427f-b423-4af59542eadd.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Receivables Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Receivables Role. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.

6a471e45-c0ab-48cc-afef-c80bc7d41a50.description: Earners of the Certified Workflow Services Developer Consultant badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to customize SYSPRO using e.net Solutions business objects, add and design SYSPRO workflows and activities, and configure role-based security for those activities and workflows. They are competent in using the Workflow Designer and the Activity Designer. These earners specialize in developing SYSPRO Workflow Services solutions.
6a471e45-c0ab-48cc-afef-c80bc7d41a50.name: Certified Workflow Services Developer Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of seven (7) online examinations.

0fba1a11-25ae-437a-a903-6b8b6526b319.description: Earners of the Certified Inventory Planning Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Inventory Planning-related SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as troubleshooting and inventory planning and management. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution but specialize in SYSPRO Inventory Forecasting, Families and Groupings, and Inventory Optimization.
0fba1a11-25ae-437a-a903-6b8b6526b319.name: Certified Inventory Planning Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications. This is comprised of thirteen (13) online examinations.

11390545-2210-48e7-a619-2788225c50dd.description: Earners of the Certified Power Tailoring Developer Consultant badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to build basic customizations in SYSPRO using e.net Solutions business objects, and develop advanced customizations using the VBScript Editor and the .NET framework. They are competent in using VBScripting and creating .NET User Controls. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and solution, but specialize in developing customized SYSPRO solutions.
11390545-2210-48e7-a619-2788225c50dd.name: Certified Power Tailoring Developer Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of seven (7) online examinations.

bba56192-2efa-47d9-b52c-240a3aa09d70.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as a Buyer or Purchasing Manager. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to maintain information which affects purchase orders and suppliers; process requisitions; manage suppliers; and process purchase orders. They can also apply their knowledge within the purchasing business process.
bba56192-2efa-47d9-b52c-240a3aa09d70.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Purchasing Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Purchasing Role. This is comprised of three (3) online examinations.

9b1b18d2-0628-49ab-8a26-0fc074a95c22.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as a Buyer or Purchasing Manager. They can use SYSPRO 7 to maintain information which affects purchase orders and suppliers; process requisitions; manage suppliers; and process purchase orders. They can also apply their knowledge within the purchasing process.
9b1b18d2-0628-49ab-8a26-0fc074a95c22.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Purchasing Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Purchasing Role. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.

98982214-ccb9-4088-91bd-1bd89d12024d.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as an Asset Controller, Bookkeeper, or Accountant. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to maintain assets; manage capex, assets, cash, and the general ledger; perform stock takes and period end tasks; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the relevant business processes.
98982214-ccb9-4088-91bd-1bd89d12024d.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Financial Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Financial Role. This is comprised of five (5) online examinations.

516d20aa-8f1b-468d-a004-59068f5a8b4c.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as an Accounts Payable Clerk or Accounts Payable Manager. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to maintain and approve requisitions; review and verify supplier contracts; manage supplier documents and payments; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the purchasing business process.
516d20aa-8f1b-468d-a004-59068f5a8b4c.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Payables Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Payables Role. This is comprised of three (3) online examinations.

5fbcc331-9146-4576-a7cc-120494c4eed9.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as an Accounts Receivable Clerk or Accounts Receivable Manager. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to maintain customers; process invoices, credit notes and debit notes; manage outstanding payments, received payments, and collections; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the sales process.
5fbcc331-9146-4576-a7cc-120494c4eed9.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Receivables Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Receivables Role. This is comprised of three (3) online examinations.

51521ab5-2001-4cf7-a590-f2352411216a.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as a Salesperson, Order Entry Clerk, or Sales Manager. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to track prospects; maintain prices for customers and stock codes; prepare, track and convert quotations to sales orders; process, track and maintain sales orders; and monitor and analyze sales orders. They can also apply their knowledge within the sales process.
51521ab5-2001-4cf7-a590-f2352411216a.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Sales Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Sales Role. This is comprised of three (3) online examinations.

a87be02d-01eb-4b21-a7d2-77d7122d3857.description: Earners of the Certified Espresso Developer Consultant badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to customize SYSPRO using e.net Solutions business objects, and build, package, test, and publish SYSPRO Espresso applications. They are competent in skills such as mobile app development and using the Application Builder and the Espresso Developer Tool. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and solution, but specialize in developing SYSPRO Espresso solutions.
a87be02d-01eb-4b21-a7d2-77d7122d3857.name: Certified Espresso Developer Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of seven (7) online examinations.

c3047400-5e09-46ba-98cb-cc4e6605d61d.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as an Accounts Payable Clerk or Accounts Payable Manager. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 7 to maintain and approve requisitions; review and verify supplier contracts; manage supplier documents and payments; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the purchasing business process.
c3047400-5e09-46ba-98cb-cc4e6605d61d.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Payables Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Payables Role. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.

2fcd9cde-6306-424f-95b3-b989cbae80f3.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as a Salesperson, Order Entry Clerk, or Sales Manager. They can use SYSPRO 7 to track prospects; maintain prices for customers and stock codes; prepare, track and convert quotations to sales orders; process, track and maintain sales orders; and monitor and analyze sales orders. They can also apply their knowledge within the sales process.
2fcd9cde-6306-424f-95b3-b989cbae80f3.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Sales Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Sales Role. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.

1d068dbf-c6b0-4aa1-abd6-c414c7fc9c26.description: Earners of the Certified Pre Sales Consultant badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to demonstrate and sell SYSPRO solutions. They are competent in skills such as presenting, product demonstration, facilitation, target market selling and analysis, and other SYSPRO sales-related tools and methodologies. These earners can architect a SYSPRO solution to solve a potential customer's business challenge, and understand the SYSPRO company and solution.
1d068dbf-c6b0-4aa1-abd6-c414c7fc9c26.name: Certified Pre Sales Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications. This is comprised of five (5) eLearning courses, eleven (11) online examinations and one (1) practical assignment.

bb6836f5-4f49-4737-a75d-578e66917b4a.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as an Inventory Control Manager or Dispatcher. They can use SYSPRO 7 to manage inventory, goods delivery, and goods receipts; perform period end tasks; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the inventory management, purchasing and sales processes.
bb6836f5-4f49-4737-a75d-578e66917b4a.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Inventory Control Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Inventory Control Role. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.

e56f5283-3fef-4955-89f0-8919faed9d79.description: Earners of this badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Administration-related SYSPRO 7 features, including security and customization. They can analyze the SYSPRO 7 system, troubleshoot and resolve system issues, perform basic system customization, and manage system security.
e56f5283-3fef-4955-89f0-8919faed9d79.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - System Administration Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User System Administration Role. This is comprised of seven (7) online examinations.

f77d9b9c-31cf-4a91-bd81-7b51ca204f6a.description: Earners of this badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to support the Administration-related SYSPRO 8 features, including security and customization. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can navigate the SYSPRO 8 system. They can also analyze the system, troubleshoot and resolve system issues, perform basic system customization, and manage system security.
f77d9b9c-31cf-4a91-bd81-7b51ca204f6a.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - System Administration Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User System Administration Role. This is comprised of eight (8) online examinations.

1fd17af2-8d5e-4346-aa8a-1b17a3be18b0.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as a Cost Accountant. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can use SYSPRO 8 to maintain inventory costs and manage BOM costs; calculate what-if and landed costs; manage actual and activity based costs; measure financial performance; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the relevant business processes.
1fd17af2-8d5e-4346-aa8a-1b17a3be18b0.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Cost Accounting Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Cost Accounting Role. This is comprised of four (4) online examinations.

65dd4d70-c67e-4dfd-8c7a-9eff0b99fe3e.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 8 as a Planner or Production Manager. They can use SYSPRO 8 to maintain structures and routings; manage estimates and quotations; forecast inventory; schedule production; plan material, capacity and resource requirements; perform maintenance tasks; and schedule, control and evaluate manufacturing operations. They can also apply their knowledge within the manufacturing business process.
65dd4d70-c67e-4dfd-8c7a-9eff0b99fe3e.name: Certified SYSPRO 8 User - Planning Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Planning Role. This is comprised of five (5) online examinations.

e6a7a370-73a7-4a16-b530-30b19fb96216.description: SYSPRO UPlift is SYSPRO's corporate social responsibility (CSR) program. The Earner demonstrates commitment to the program and supports initiatives relating to either communities, the environment or skills development.
e6a7a370-73a7-4a16-b530-30b19fb96216.name: SYSPRO UPlifter 2021

badge_template_activities.title: The Earner has completed 1 year of commitment to SYSPRO's CSR program.

b797776f-cae3-4220-a4fa-e8937567406f.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as an Asset Controller, Bookkeeper, or Accountant. They can use SYSPRO 7 to maintain assets; manage capex, assets, cash, and the general ledger; perform stock takes and period end tasks; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the asset management, purchasing, sales, balancing, and auditing processes.
b797776f-cae3-4220-a4fa-e8937567406f.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Financial Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Financial Role. This is comprised of three (3) online examinations.

55fd10e3-3ab1-4514-965c-62a7d82c72ca.description: Earners of the Certified Technical Solutions Consultant badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to install, upgrade, and support SYSPRO and Microsoft SQL Server. They are competent in skills such as system analysis, troubleshooting, integration, system administration, and using the SYSPRO methodologies and tools. These earners understand the SYSPRO company and entire solution, but specialize in the technical aspects of SYSPRO.
55fd10e3-3ab1-4514-965c-62a7d82c72ca.name: Certified Technical Solutions Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 Certifications. This is comprised of eleven (11) online examinations.
Achieve the Microsoft Certification DP-900: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals OR Certification DP-300: Administering Microsoft Azure SQL Solutions

5b07d9fe-2ed8-43fd-8e20-240d6eb445d3.description: Earners of the Certified Independent Software Vendor badge have the knowledge and skills required to integrate third party software into SYSPRO. They are competent in skills such as basic system administration, security features, customization and e.net development.
5b07d9fe-2ed8-43fd-8e20-240d6eb445d3.name: Certified Independent Software Vendor

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 Certification. This is comprised of five (5) online examinations.

82eaa3ba-d489-4ac6-8f03-d350afb16611.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as a Cost Accountant. They can use SYSPRO 7 to maintain inventory costs and manage BOM costs; calculate what-if and landed costs; manage actual and activity based costs; measure financial performance; and balance the relevant sub-ledgers to the General Ledger. They can also apply their knowledge within the purchasing, manufacturing, and inventory management processes.
82eaa3ba-d489-4ac6-8f03-d350afb16611.name: Certified SYSPRO 7 User - Cost Accounting Role

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 7: SYSPRO User Cost Accounting Role. This is comprised of two (2) online examinations.

b896e599-0954-4eb8-b4a9-31ba3073d0d8.description: Earners of this badge have the intermediate knowledge and skills required to perform their duties in SYSPRO 7 as a Planner or Production Manager. They can use SYSPRO 7 to maintain structures and routings; manage estimates and quotations; forecast inventory; schedule production; plan material, capacity and resource requirements; perform maintenance tasks; and schedule, control and evaluate manufacturing operations. They can also apply their knowledge within the manufacturing business process.

7dc7118b-5b3c-4026-a015-f1ffcac8fb29.description: This award recognizes an individual who supports the Learning for Growth initiative by developing and maintaining a Growth Mindset through continuous learning. 7dc7118b-5b3c-4026-a015-f1ffcac8fb29.name: Global CEO Award - Excellence in Learning 2022

4003956f-8bba-4186-ae15-9d782adce5eb.description: The winner of this award displays behavior in support of our 6 SYSPRO values: Growth Mindset: Drive the growth of employees, customers partners and our business in everything we do. Integrity: Keep our promises and always do what is right. Passionate: We thrive on the success of our products, people, partners and customers. Results-driven: We get things done. Authenticity: Dependable and trustworthy. Winning together: Collaborate to achieve collective success.

badge_template_activities.title: Engages in training and learning to better oneself and ensure continuous upskilling of themselves and others. 911dcf26-6969-4544-ba42-e088a0490977.description: Earners of this badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to customize SYSPRO using e.net Solutions business objects, add and design SYSPRO workflows and activities, and configure role-based security for those activities and workflows. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can navigate the SYSPRO 8 system. They can also use the Workflow Designer and the Activity Designer.

70ba1809-c0e1-4ba7-ba3f-d0027e574182.name: Certified SYSPRO Facilitator - Technical Level 1

b3e1fbb6-ef04-4c3f-97cc-d67ade65ec22.description: Earners of this badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to customize SYSPRO 8 using e.net Solutions business objects, and build, package, test, and publish SYSPRO Espresso applications. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can navigate the SYSPRO 8 system. They can also develop mobile apps and use the Application Builder and the Espresso Developer Tool.
b3e1fbb6-ef04-4c3f-97cc-d67ade65ec22.name: Certified SYSPRO User - Espresso Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Espresso Developer. This is comprised of seven (7) online examinations.

f019825e-f207-49ab-a9a7-e311f87e9fcb.description: Earners of this badge have the advanced knowledge and skills required to build basic customizations in SYSPRO using e.net Solutions business objects, and develop advanced customizations using the VBScript Editor and the .NET framework. They are familiar with basic ERP industry terms and can navigate the SYSPRO 8 system. They can also use VBScripting and create .NET User Controls.
f019825e-f207-49ab-a9a7-e311f87e9fcb.name: Certified SYSPRO User - Power Tailoring Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve the Level 1 and Level 2 Certifications of Certification Path 8: SYSPRO User Power Tailoring Developer. This is comprised of seven (7) online examinations.

a2521841-93c9-4491-8276-52f467e6c34e.description: The Earner prioritizes a customer centric approach, educates customers and goes the extra mile in adhering to organizational processes. The Earner understands customers and treats them with honesty, courtesy and respect. They take ownership of customer needs and see them through to their conclusion. The Earner advocates for improvement in the existing processes and demonstrates good behaviors both with customers and peers.
a2521841-93c9-4491-8276-52f467e6c34e.name: Global CEO Award - Customer Centricity 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Displays commitment to activities or demonstrates outstanding skill or effort related to customer service, above and beyond prescribed duties and workload.

48553eb3-caa4-462b-b12e-2cbbeff81311.description: This award goes to the person who is passionate about the product, the company and our people and displays a keen and in-depth understanding of our business. They are constantly building and strengthening relationships and demonstrate natural leadership skills.
48553eb3-caa4-462b-b12e-2cbbeff81311.name: Global CEO Award - Excellence as a SYSPRO Brand Ambassador 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Constantly building and strengthening relationships internally as well as with partners, suppliers, and customers.

df3e48af-4d37-44a5-943f-761fbd328c0f.description: The Earner has demonstrated extraordinary effort in achieving sales while supporting the business strategy.
df3e48af-4d37-44a5-943f-761fbd328c0f.name: Global CEO Award - Sales Success

badge_template_activities.title: Plays an integral role in the sale of a SYSPRO solution to customers within our target market.

ceb991cc-5054-4ce6-b73c-440622147908.description: This is an award for all round exemplary performance and service. It is awarded to the employee who consistently gives their best for the benefit of SYSPRO and our people. The Earner embodies the spirit of SYSPRO and is an inspiration to all those around them.
ceb991cc-5054-4ce6-b73c-440622147908.name: Global CEO Award - The Phil Duff Award

badge_template_activities.title: Excellence in performance. Provides clear and effective peer-to-peer communication. Drives personal and team accomplishments. Demonstrates reliability and co-operation.
